description: Shitara Sensei is the school nurse. Her passion for http://anidb.net/ch25543 [Takagi Fumio] is as strong as it is unrequited and one-sided, which is saying a lot. A perverted "M", she takes pleasure in setting up elaborate scenarios which are intended to, but never succeed in, getting her in bed with Takagi.
name: Shitara Yurie
